Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.

nlike email, people consider SMS reporting simple and limited to just message status as delivered or failed. While we take it equally important for the business growth to know the response rate, leads generated, sales & conversion rate obtained, to measure ROI based on these insights.

SUse our platform to get access to some amazingly precise and detailed insights for your sent campaigns. From delivery reporting to generating campaign summaries, graphical reporting to advanced log tables for each message, you have everything that you need for closer analysis.

Obtain important information about the contacts in your list even before sending any message to them. Learn how many of the numbers in your list carry potential delivery failures, exact carrier & destination of the deliverables and such meaningful insights.
